languages.text: В день смерти погибший работал с напарником Гведоном. Он должен содержаться с другими задержанными в главной зале недалеко от армиллярной сферы под надзором офицера Хротко.

On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.
languages.original_text: В день смерти погибший работал с напарником Гведоном. Он должен содержаться с другими задержанными в главной зале недалеко от армиллярной сферы под надзором офицера Хротко.

languages.text: Le jour de sa mort, la victime travaillait en binôme avec un certain Gwedon. Cet homme est probablement détenu dans la salle principale, non loin de la sphère armillaire, avec les autres prisonniers placés sous la surveillance du capitaine Hrotko.
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.

traits.locale_text: Le jour de sa mort, la victime travaillait en binôme avec un certain Gwedon. Cet homme est probablement détenu dans la salle principale, non loin de la sphère armillaire, avec les autres prisonniers placés sous la surveillance du capitaine Hrotko.

languages.text: El día que murió, la víctima trabajaba con su compañero Gwedon. El tal Gwedon probablemente esté con los otros prisioneros, bajo custodia del capitán Hrotko en la sala principal situada cerca de la esfera armilar.
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.

traits.locale_text: El día que murió, la víctima trabajaba con su compañero Gwedon. El tal Gwedon probablemente esté con los otros prisioneros, bajo custodia del capitán Hrotko en la sala principal situada cerca de la esfera armilar.

languages.text: 受害者死亡当天曾和他的工友戈登一起工作。这个叫做戈登的人，很可能和其他嫌疑人一起被关押在天体仪附近的大厅里，在赫洛卡上尉的监视之下。
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.

traits.locale_text: 受害者死亡当天曾和他的工友戈登一起工作。这个叫做戈登的人，很可能和其他嫌疑人一起被关押在天体仪附近的大厅里，在赫洛卡上尉的监视之下。

languages.text: 死亡した日、被害者はパートナーのグウェドンと行動を共にしていた。このグウェドンは、フロトコ中隊長の監視の下、他の逮捕者たちとともに天球儀からそう離れていない大広間で拘束されていたようだ。
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.

traits.locale_text: 死亡した日、被害者はパートナーのグウェドンと行動を共にしていた。このグウェドンは、フロトコ中隊長の監視の下、他の逮捕者たちとともに天球儀からそう離れていない大広間で拘束されていたようだ。

languages.text: Das Opfer hat am Tag seines Todes mit seinem Partner Gwedon zusammengearbeitet. Besagter Gwedon befindet sich vermutlich bei den anderen, in Captain Hrotkos Schicht verhafteten, Gefangenen in der Haupthalle unweit der Armillarsphäre.
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.

traits.locale_text: Das Opfer hat am Tag seines Todes mit seinem Partner Gwedon zusammengearbeitet. Besagter Gwedon befindet sich vermutlich bei den anderen, in Captain Hrotkos Schicht verhafteten, Gefangenen in der Haupthalle unweit der Armillarsphäre.

languages.text: Kurban, hayatını kaybettiği gün ortağı Gwedon'la birlikte çalışıyordu. Gwedon, muhtemelen halka küreden çok da uzak olmayan ana salonda gözaltında tutuluyor. Komutan Hrotko'nun gözetimi altındaki diğer tutukluların yanındadır.
languages.original_text: On the day he died, the victim was working together with his partner Gwedon. This Gwedon is likely being held in custody in the main hall not far from the armillary sphere, along with the other arrestees under Captain Hrotko's watch.
